title: The " Launch" Option is invisible?
body: This morning i tried to start the game, and when  i opened it, it doesn't show the launch button for some reason,i also can not click on the settings, or minimize or anything for that matter, in task manager it just says client patcher is running  but there is no show of it updating, or even patching. :(****

replies.body:
Hmmmm if your patcher loads but you can't click on anything and it never starts patching there might be some corrupted files somewhere in your league installation. 

Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the force repatch option selected. Let me know how that helps!
